entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deux-Montagnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
